issue.title: [Go] Lift LICENSE to new module dir
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14728](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14728). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since we shifted the go.mod file up one level, the LICENSE.txt file is in the wrong directory making our documentation unreadable on pkg.go.dev until we shift it up and fix it.
